pullRequest.title: Showcase modifications for a given material
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #8331
Description:

added edit button for package and plugin materials
added feature to view the modifications for a given material
also added the feature to search for a modification based on revision, comment and username

beforeCommit.message: add searching feature on modifications modal

afterCommit.message: add searching feature on modifications modal

nodes.bodyText: Currently, the search for a modification is throttled at 500 ms. Let me know if this is not required.

beforeCommit.message: add searching feature on modifications modal

commit.message: Add edit action button for package and plugin materials
Show action button to render all the modifications for a given material in a modal popup

improve the rendering of the modifications
 - also added the pagination buttons to go the next or previous page
Show VSM link with revision in the modifications modal
add searching feature on modifications modal
Render the modification comment as truncated in the body
Set page_size in next/previous query if greater than 10

Updated the view of the modifications modal
 - instead of key-value pair - render comment as truncated text
 - updated the page_size to 20

afterCommit.message:
Updated the view of the modifications modal
 - instead of key-value pair - render comment as truncated text
 - updated the page_size to 20
